originalText.text: Justin did a fabulous job speaking about Charm. I was genuinely impressed by his presentation and his passion.  Thank you.

originalText.text: Great experience. I have enjoyed the in-person service. Most of the new age churches are relying on electronic service but for me a live inter active service is what I need to move me thru the week.

text.text: Great experience. I have enjoyed the in-person service. Most of the new age churches are relying on electronic service but for me a live inter active service is what I need to move me thru the week.

originalText.text:
I am grateful for, and impressed by, the Unity Center.

I have visited this church several times for Sunday-morning services, and each time, I've left feeling spiritually enriched (as well as rather pleased with the production quality, which manages to be professional and polished without being pretentious or "showy"). The music has always been soulful and powerful, and the messages, substantial and meaningful. Likewise, the congregation has, in my interactions, appeared enlivened and sincere.

However, what I have found most valuable about the Unity services is their richness of truth. Yes, the music and fellowship and lectures are nice; though, without containing wisdom and lesson, such a gathering would miss the point - but, thankfully, that is not the case with this church (in my experience, at least). From what I've witnessed, the speakers at Unity have delivered powerful, authentic messages that, for those with "ears to hear," have much to teach. Furthermore, these profound words have been delivered with compassion, thoughtfulness, and a genuine sense of purpose (or so it seemed to me).

Rare is such an organization, and I feel privileged to have taken part in it.

Much thanks to all who make this ministry happen. Please, continue this infinitely important work :)

Sincerely,
C St Paul
South Carolina
